text: MaterialX flavor of USD UV Texture 2.3 shader
The node parameters reflect the officially supported attributes of the USD texture primitive. This differs from USD UV Texture 2.2 in the number of outputs.
When reading normal maps, set the
to ensure colorspace is not applied to the incoming data.  The bias and scale parameters on this node are an easy way to convert the data from 0->1 range to -1->1 range
input is expected to be a tangent-space vector in -1 to 1 range.
